a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan:
Based on the expert estimates and index by the
Bertelsmann Transformation Index (2024)
. It combines
information on the extent of political participation, the rule of law, stable democratic institutions, political and
social integration, and a capable state. It ranges from 1 to 10 (most democratic).
